attributes.review:
The moment I downloaded this app I nearly cried in pain and fear as it released a bunch of cockroaches that ate my toes and then continued to eat my family. At times like this I wish I had my UNO reverse card so you would understand the pain of not having enough bread to feed my small chickens. 
According to all known laws of aviation, there is no way a bee should be able to fly. Itâ€™s wings are too small to lift its fat body off of the ground (like yours). The bee of course flies anyway because bees donâ€™t care what humans think is impossible.

-Barry Bee Benson
